document_data.series: Circle of Stones (1 of 3)The adventure introduction states that Silver Lining "is the beginning of [&hellip] the "Invisible Road" and "Circle of Stones" Major Quests". The "Invisible Road" Major Quest appears to have no continuation after this adventure.
document_data.mainbody:
Silver Lining, designed by Brad Gardner, is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 4th-edition ruleset.
